org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.external

Interface RobotStateMonitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SoundPlayingRobotMonitor

    public interface RobotStateMonitor
    Instances of RobotStateMonitor can be registered with the Callback of UpdateUI in order to receive notifications when certain event transitions happen within the robot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Informs the monitor that a critical error occurred in the robot, or clears any error previously reported.
      void updateNetworkStatus(NetworkStatus networkStatus, java.lang.String extra)
      Informs the monitor of the current status of the network connection.
      void updatePeerStatus(PeerStatus peerStatus)
      Informs the monitor of the current status of relationship to the peer application.
      void updateRobotState(RobotState robotState)
      Informs the monitor of the current state of the robot.
      void updateRobotStatus(RobotStatus robotStatus)
      Informs the monitor of the current status of the robot.
      void updateWarningMessage(java.lang.String warningMessage)
      Informs the monitor that a warning has occurred in the robot, or clears any warning previously reported.

    • Method Detail

      • updateRobotState

        void updateRobotState(RobotState robotState)
        Informs the monitor of the current state of the robot. This may or may not be different from the state previously reported.
        Parameters:
        robotState - the current state of the robot.

      • updateRobotStatus

        void updateRobotStatus(RobotStatus robotStatus)
        Informs the monitor of the current status of the robot. This may or may not be different from the status previously reported. The robot status provides additional information when the robot is not in the running state.
        Parameters:
        robotStatus - the current status of the robot
        See Also:
        RobotStatus

      • updatePeerStatus

        void updatePeerStatus(PeerStatus peerStatus)
        Informs the monitor of the current status of relationship to the peer application. This may or may not be different from the status previously reported.
        Parameters:
        peerStatus - the relationship of this app to its peer
        See Also:
        PeerStatus

      • updateNetworkStatus

        void updateNetworkStatus(NetworkStatus networkStatus,
                         java.lang.String extra)
        Informs the monitor of the current status of the network connection. This may or may not be different from the status previously reported.
        Parameters:
        networkStatus - the current status of the network connection
        extra - additional information useful in some statuses

      • updateErrorMessage

        void updateErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Informs the monitor that a critical error occurred in the robot, or clears any error previously reported. This may or may not be different from the error message previously reported.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - the error message being reported, or null if the error is being cleared.

      • updateWarningMessage

        void updateWarningMessage(java.lang.String warningMessage)
        Informs the monitor that a warning has occurred in the robot, or clears any warning previously reported. This may or may not be different from the warning message previously reported.
        Parameters:
        warningMessage - the warning message being reported, or null if the warning is being cleared.
